summary: This document is a financial statement from Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas detailing account balances and transactions for a specific account over the month of December 2016. It includes information on deposits, withdrawals, and service charges, highlighting significant outgoing transfers.

persons.name: Stewart Oldfield
persons.context: Stewart Oldfield is mentioned as the contact for personal assistance regarding the account statement.

events.title: Incoming Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $10,000 was credited to the account from Kyara Investments.

events.title: Outgoing Money Transfer
events.description: A transfer of $750,000 was debited from the account to an entity identified as Harlieq Itn Dane LLC.

locations: 6100 Red Hook Quarter B3, St Thomas 00802, United States
keyFacts: The account had a beginning balance of $2,706,301.73 on December 1, 2016.
The account experienced a significant outgoing transfer of $750,000 on December 6, 2016.
There were no service charges or overdraft fees during the statement period.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors on the account statement.
